author: Joseph Guzman
title: Fauci: It's mind-boggling that China's wet markets are still operating during coronavirus pandemic | TheHill - The Hill
description: Fauci: It's mind-boggling that China's wet markets are still operating during coronavirus pandemic | TheHill The Hill Dr. Fauci Shuts Down 'Fox & Friends' on Coronavirus Cure: 'We Don't Operate on How You Feel' The Daily Beast Coronavirus: Dr. Anthony Fauci w…
content:
Dr. Anthony Fauci, a key member of the White House coronavirus task force, said Friday China and other nations should be pressured to shut down so-called wet markets as the new novel coronavirus spreads throughout the world.
